entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
